name: Main Division
description: Core guild members focused on all activities including WoE, MVP hunting, and training
achievements: WoE specialists, MVP hunters, Training leaders

name: WoE Team
description: Specialized in castle defense and offense, responsible for weekly WoE
achievements: Multiple castle captures, Perfect defense record, Weekly WoE champions

name: MVP Hunters
description: Dedicated to hunting MVP bosses and rare item farming
achievements: Record MVP kills, Rare item acquisitions, Speed run records

name: Training Division
description: Focused on helping new members adapt and grow
achievements: Successfully trained 50+ members, High retention rate, Mentorship excellence

name: Support Team
description: Provides support for all activities and maintains guild resources
achievements: Perfect attendance, Community service, Resource management
